trans-unit.target: Nab'il tib'aj ttenb'il u'jb'il te Pujb'ilyol tuk'il tilb'ilal

trans-unit.source: Use this template to make a picture dictionary that is monolingual, bilingual, or trilingual.
trans-unit.target: Tz'ajb'en ttenb'il u'jb'il lu', tu'n tb'inchet jun Pujb'ilyol tuk'il tilb'ilal tz'ib'an tuj junyol, kab'yol mo ox yol.

trans-unit.source: This book is currently marked "experimental" because we know of several problems in layout and convenience.
trans-unit.target: Aju u'jb'il lu' tok techil ja'lon ikytzan "niky'b'en" tu'n tlaj ojtzqi'nqe' mya' b'a'n ti'j tb'inchb'il ex txub'txajil.
